name: client-side-ai-demo
description: A collection of client-side AI capability demos

scripts.build:phi: cd phi-3.5-webgpu && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:summarization: cd summarization-api-playground && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:explain: cd explain-in-generations && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:next: cd next-client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:techstack: cd techstack-time-machine && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:video-bg: cd video-background-removal && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:video-obj: cd video-object-detection && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:phichat: cd onnxruntimeweb-phichat && npm install && npm run build
